title: emanija
author: emanija
content: Hello, I would like to ask what system is used here https://listnova.biz/ https://bliyzer.com/  https://deliam.cc/ - and maybe you have the script? Or maybe you have and know something similar?

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: System named scam ?99 % of cloud mining services are just a scam.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: emanija on January 20, 2023, 08:13:49 AMHello, I would like to ask what system is used here https://listnova.biz/ https://bliyzer.com/  https://deliam.cc/ - and maybe you have the script? Or maybe you have and know something similar?It's really just that most often cloud mining is a ponzi scheme and it's better not to succumb to their exhortations about getting you passive income, you will simply lose your funds. Just checked here https://www.scam-detector.com/validator/listnova-biz-review / you can check the rest yourself and make sure from the reviews that they are scammers

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: emanija on January 20, 2023, 08:13:49 AMHello, I would like to ask what system is used here <> and maybe you have the script? Or maybe you have and know something similar?So you're asking us if we have a Ponzi scheme WordPress layout? Lol!Might I ask you for what type of "research purposes" you're desiring such a filthy thing?Quote from: Daltonik on January 20, 2023, 11:56:34 AMIt's really just that most often cloud mining is a ponzi scheme and it's better not to succumb to their exhortations about getting you passive income, you will simply lose your funds.He's not asking if he should invest, he wants to create one of those websites, for others to invest!

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: 4. HOW MUCH CAN I EARN WITH LISTNOVA?Every day you can earn from 5% to 15% of your deposit amount + referral bonuses.https://listnova.biz/faqThere are no such profits in mining.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Does it look like you are planning to make a landing page using a Ponzi scheme cloud mining site?I doubt you are from another forum(it's just a guess due to your username)? And I think you want to make a cloud mining site as a landing page to put some CPA offer or maybe it is a straight cloud mining site with no investment return(Scam).There are some free templates out there but no one will share them because we know you will use them to scam. There are also paid ones but the problem is some of them are also scammers. I'm sure you will receive some PMs who are selling templates beware.

comments.author: CryptounityCUT
comments.body: Quote from: emanija on January 20, 2023, 08:13:49 AMHello, I would like to ask what system is used here https://listnova.biz/ https://bliyzer.com/  https://deliam.cc/ - and maybe you have the script? Or maybe you have and know something similar?The best option for mining is to buy a mining rig, check first how much it will cost your monthly electricity payment, and the mining rig itself. Then you will see how much you will eventually get with mining. For cloud mining I do not recommend this, unffortunally 99% are scams.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: emanija on January 20, 2023, 08:13:49 AMHello, I would like to ask what system is used here https://listnova.biz/ https://bliyzer.com/  https://deliam.cc/ - and maybe you have the script? Or maybe you have and know something similar?There is Google for this I tried it and it gave me these results But I don't encourage you to create one, script like these only prove that cloud mining is a Ponzi scheme because there are actually no mining rigs to speak of, everything depends on money coming in, to payout those who invested earlier.
